title: Google to sign EU’s AI code of practice despite concerns
description: The European Union enacted the guardrails for the use of artificial intelligence in an attempt to set a potential global benchmark for a technology used in business and everyday life
content:
Google was concerned that the AI Act and code of practice risk slowing Europe's development and deployment of AI. (Image: Reuters)

title: Meta surges after Q2 results blow past expectations
description: In the midst of an artificial intelligence spending spree, Meta has posted stronger-than-expected results for the second quarter, buoyed by growing ad revenue.
content:
Meta easily beat Wall Street's expectations for the second quarter, helped by a growing user base. (AP PHOTO)

title: Goodwill Industries partners with Google for free AI training course
description: Goodwill Industries has partnered with Google to train 200,000 people in artificial intelligence skils in the United States.
content:
July 30 (UPI) -- Goodwill Industries has partnered with Google to train 200,000 people in artificial intelligence skills in the United States.
Goodwill, which helps people find jobs, will provide Google's AI Essentials course at no charge, the nonpro... [2422 chars]

title: Meta stock surges after Q2 results blow past expectations despite heavy AI spending
description: In the midst of an artificial intelligence spending spree, Meta posted stronger-than-expected results for the second quarter, buoyed by growing ad revenue even as its expenses increased.
content:
Meta’s artificial intelligence spending spree appears to be paying off with investors, who sent the company’s stock soaring after hours on Wednesday following a blowout quarterly earnings report.

title: Meta's big AI spending blitz will continue into 2026
description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg plans to continue his company's artificial intelligence spending blitz well into the next year as rival tech giants do the same.
content:
Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg plans to continue his company's artificial intelligence spending blitz well into the next year as rival tech giants do the same.

title: Meta stock surges after Q2 results blow past expectations despite heavy AI spending
description: By BARBARA ORTUTAY Meta’s artificial intelligence spending spree appears to be paying off with investors, who sent the company’s stock soaring after hours on Wednesday following a blowout quarterly earnings report. title: Equinix raises annual results forecast on steady data center demand
description: Data center firm Equinix raised its forecast for annual results on Wednesday, signaling steady demand from its enterprise customers investing in AI solutions. The company has benefited from the increased demand for data center infrastructure amid a surge in artificial intelligence usage. Major cloud firms, including Google, have pledged significant investments this year to expand on AI, underscoring robust demand for AI-related products and solutions.
content:
The logo of Equinix is pictured at the entrance of a data center in Pantin
(Reuters) -Data center firm Equinix raised its forecast for annual results on Wednesday, signaling steady demand from its enterprise customers investing in AI solutions.

title: Meta shares jump after strong third-quarter sales forecast
description: The company behind Facebook and the software giant backing OpenAI are spending huge sums on artificial intelligence. Shareholders are starting to see dividends.
